Next, for the time frame start and end, I'll use the exact year of publication as a reference point. Now, regarding the location. The play is a comedy by Rotrou, and since he was a French author, it's reasonable to assume that the setting is in France. Without specific details in the metadata about the play's setting, I can't pinpoint an exact location within France, so it's best to generalize it as France itself.
